thread.section_title: LifeStation Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LifeStation | lifestation.com
thread.title: Louisa Bonano

author: Louisa Bonano
title: Louisa Bonano
text:
I had surgery in June of last year. I had family
over to help. I was home for a week. It was Sunday of that week family left. Soon I got really sick to my stomach and vomiting dizziness began. Well I was very scared couldn't move because of my surgery it was an emergency surgery. Long story short I pushed my emergency button of my LifeStation and they were there helping me and keeping me calm. The ambulance came into my apartment and took me to the hospital. I had a very serious infection in my stomach. Funny I only had LifeStation a few weeks. So happy I did. Thank you LifeStation.
